name: invictus (JOAN WU)
description:
🚢⚓️🌊

this bitsy walking simulator game deals with loss, stagnation, and finding motivation to keep going, based on the poem “Invictus” by William Ernest Henley, including quotes from The Myth of Sisyphus by Albert Camus

use WASD or arrow keys to move and interact 

story, art and game by joan wu 

proofreading by lim yi tian 

music: PIano by the Ocean, by novo_sound, edited by joan wu

⏳🧭💦
